title: My phone randomly reboots itself. While on whatsapp and instagram, Updating apps from store it do so
content: Today July 3 , i started to experience this crashing reboot issue.. I dont know the cause.. I was simply going through whatsapp and when i opened whatsapp Camera.. the phone went off and reboot itself.. the issue continue till now.. I am afraid that i could complete my security software update on July 5th because if the phone gets off while updating.. the phone will crash.. please help me and do the needfull
